trans-unit.source: Cannot copy folder "%s" into target folder "%s", because there is already a folder or file with that name in the target folder!
Cannot move folder "%s" into target folder "%s", because the target folder is already within the folder to be moved!
Could not access all necessary resources. Source file or destination maybe was not within your mountpoints? T="%s", D="%s"
Could not delete directory! Is directory "%s" empty? (You are not allowed to delete directories recursively).
Could not delete directory "%s"! There might be a problem with write permissions.
Could not delete file "%s". There might be a problem with write permissions.
Destination "%s" already exists!
Destination path "%s" was not within your mountpoints!
Destination "%s" was not a directory.
Directory "%s" copied to "%s".
Directory "%s" created in "%s".
Directory "%s" moved to "%s".
Directory "%s" not created. There might be a problem with write permissions in "%s"?
Directory renamed from "%s" to "%s".
Directory renamed from "%s" to "%s". Characters in the new directory name have been replaced.
Directory "%s" was not renamed. (Same name as before)
Directory "%s" WAS NOT copied to "%s"! There might be a problem with write permissions
Directory "%s" WAS NOT moved to "%s"! There might be a problem with write permissions
Directory "%s" was not renamed! There might be a problem with write permissions in "%s"?
Extension of file name "%s" is not allowed in "%s"!
Extension of file name "%s" or "%s" was not allowed!
Extension of file "%s" was not allowed!
File "%s" already exists in folder "%s"!
File "%s" copied to "%s".
File created: "%s".
The file name "%s" is invalid, the file was automatically renamed to "%s".
File existed already in "%s"!
File extension "%s" is not a textfile format! (%s).
File extension is not "zip".
File "%s" moved to "%s".
File name "%s" was not allowed!
File "%s" or destination "%s" was not within your mountpoints!
File or directory "%s" already exists!
File renamed from "%s" to "%s".
File "%s" was not renamed. (Same name as before)
File saved to "%s".
File "%s" WAS NOT copied to "%s"! There might be a problem with write permissions.
File "%s" was not created! There might be a problem with write permissions in "%s"?
File "%s" was not renamed! There might be a problem with write permissions in "%s"?
File "%s" was not saved! There might be a problem with write permissions.
File "%s" was not saved! File extension rejected!
No file was uploaded!
No file was uploaded for replacing!
No name for new folder given!
No unique filename available in "%s"!
Replacing file "%s" to "%s".
Target "%s" already exists!
Target "%s" was not a file!
Target was not within your mountpoints! T="%s".
The file "%s" did not exist!
The function to copy a file between storages is not yet implemented.
The function to copy a folder between storages is not yet implemented.
The function to move a file between storages is not yet implemented.
The function to move a folder between storages is not yet implemented.
The upload has failed, no uploaded file found!
The uploaded file "%s" exceeds the size-limit
Unzipping file "%s" in "%s".
Uploaded file could not be moved! There might be a problem with write permissions in "%s"?
Uploading file "%s" to "%s".
You are not allowed to access the directory.
You are not allowed to access the file.
You are not allowed to copy directories.
You are not allowed to copy files.
Invalid folder name "%s"!
You are not allowed to create directories!
You are not allowed to create files!
You are not allowed to edit files!
You are not allowed to move directories.
You are not allowed to move files.
You are not allowed to override "%s"!
You are not allowed to rename directories!
You are not allowed to rename files!
You are not allowed to unzip files.
You are not allowed to upload files!
You don't have full access to the destination directory "%s"!
Mime-type "%s" not allowed for file extension "%s".
File extension "%s" is not in the list of allowed values.
